```{r}
# http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27430042/parse-nested-json-to-data-frame-in-r
# install.packages("rjson")
library("rjson")

json_file <- paste("data/matches", 1, ".json", sep = "")
json_data <- fromJSON(file=json_file)
json_data <- lapply(json_data$matches, function(x){ unlist(x)})

library(plyr)
matchData <- rbind.fill(lapply(matchData.i, 
    function(x) do.call("data.frame", as.list(x))
))

# library(jsonlite)
# https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tidyjson/vignettes/introduction-to-tidyjson.html
# library(tidyjson)   # this library

for (i in 1:10) {
  json_file <- paste("data/matches", i, ".json", sep = "")
	json_data <- fromJSON(file=json_file)
}
```
